first_para: Christopher Dimitri Kelly (born 1978), known as Chris Kelly, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Dudley South constituency in England's West Midlands. Kelly decided to stand down at the 2015 general election after serving a single term.

full.extract: Christopher Dimitri Kelly (born 1978), known as Chris Kelly, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Dudley South constituency in England's West Midlands. Kelly decided to stand down at the 2015 general election after serving a single term.
full.title: Chris Kelly (British politician)
